title: Gab & Juls Show: Is Thomas Tuchel making Chelsea nervous?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Chelsea’s 2-1 defeat against Southampton, and ask whether Thomas Tuchel makes his side more nervous when under pressure. The guys also discuss Chelsea’s late-window signings, Arthur’s imminent move to Liverpool & AC Milan’s Sergino Dest signing.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Pressure on Tuchel; Haaland shines; transfer deadline day discussion
